title: Our Intern Is Being Sued For How Much Money?!
description:
Over TWO YEARS ago, our intern Meredith got into a minor fender bender. thankfully no one was injured, and they were able to go their separate ways. Meredith thought she was in the clear until months later, she received a letter in the mail saying the person she hit were in a “violent crash” and resulted in “significant bodily injury.”
Now, they're asking for 100,000 dollars in compensation, and the case still hasn't been resolved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
